text:
[Verse]
Stars are shining bright tonight
In the sky they glow so right
Moonbeams dance on silver streams
We are lost in moonlit dreams

[Verse 2]
Soft breeze whispers in the night
Echoes of a distant light
Holding hands we walk the sand
Feeling like we’ll never land

[Chorus]
Moonlit dreams in our eyes
Boundless skies and lullabies
In this moment you and I
Forever in our moonlit sky

[Verse 3]
Shadows play upon the ground
Silent world no single sound
Hearts align like stars above
Wrapped in this nocturnal love

[Bridge]
Time stands still we close our eyes
Flying high without goodbye
In this dream we’re here to stay
Till the dawn takes us away

[Chorus]
Moonlit dreams in our eyes
Boundless skies and lullabies
In this moment you and I
Forever in our moonlit sky
title: Moonlit Dreams
